borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2021/02727/FUL dated 28th October 2021 for the 'Erection of a front and rear roof extension involving an increase in the ridge height; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of a side infill extension at first floor level; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of existing back addition; installation of a rooflight in the side roofslope; installation of French doors and a Juliette balcony to replace existing window, to the rear elevation of first floor back addition; installation of a new window to replace existing window to the rear elevation, and infilling of an existing window to the side elevation at first floor level; alterations to the front garden; excavation of front garden and part of side and rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement of existing basement; erection of an external staircase at the front of the property from ground floor level into the proposed lightwell; erection of an external staircase at the rear garden from ground floor level into the proposed lightwell, including the installation of glass balustrade.' Amendments sought for alterations to the rear facade material and altering the appearance of 1no. aluminium doors to the single storey ground floor extension.
